name: Luth Research
overview:
Luth Research was founded in 1977 and has continued to grow as a market research leader by combining traditional market research with innovative technology. We offer a wide range of analytical and consulting services that allow us to handle simple to complex research projects. We have a proprietary online international panel with over 3 million panelists and call center. We are known for customer service, quality and depth of industry expertise.

Customer satisfaction, brand tracking, new concept testing and segmentation are just some of the ways Luth partners with prominent local and national brands.

Services offered:

In-house data collection resources lends more flexibility in methodology recommendations as well as cost and timing efficiencies

Multi-dimensional data collection channels ensure a true turn-key solution
